fields.name: Replacement Weapon:

fields.value: <sands> Energy Recharge or Elemental Mastery |<goblet>  Pyro DMG Bonus |<circlet>  CRIT Rate / CRIT DMG

fields.name: Notes:
fields.value: Generally, Xiangling requires around 180% ER. Her main source of damage Pyronado, has a hefty 80 burst cost.
